greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to choose a nonempty submultiset of a factorization of n into factors greater than one.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d>1} f(d) * f(n/d) where f(n) = A001055(n) is the number of factorizations of n into factors greater than 1.
example: The a(12) = 12 submultisets ("<" means subset or equal):
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 27 2018
